text: in 2012 we launched amazon dynamodb a
fast fully managed no sequel database
today we're adding a bunch of new
capabilities inside of dynamodb to make
dynamo development even more flexible
than ever before first of all we're
launching native support for json which
means that you can load your JSON
documents directly into dynamodb and use
core dynamodb features like conditional
puts and global secondary indexes to
query any element inside of your JSON
object DynamoDB now supports both key
value and document data structures
giving you the best of both worlds
flexibility and scalability we built
DynamoDB because managing a large scale
highly performant database is difficult
and takes a lot of time time that you
could be spending on your app this is
why we built dynamodb into a fully
managed service so that scale and
operations is our problem and not yours
developers love using DynamoDB for their
mission-critical production workloads
for example the popular mobile game
battle camp one of the top 100 highest
grossing apps is run entirely on
DynamoDB ad tech companies like a drool
and support over 10,000 advertisers
spanning over a hundred countries use
DynamoDB for its high throughput low
latency real-time ad bidding systems
speaking of flexibility or expanding
support for larger items and we're
making it easier and faster than ever
for you to scale your I ops on DynamoDB
as well we're also increasing the free
tier giving developers the ability to
run meaningful production workloads
entirely within the DynamoDB free tier
well that's enough talking let's go to
the demo for our demo application we use
data that nASA has made publicly
available specifically we built our
application around the beautiful images
that the curiosity Mars rover has been
sending back to us from the red planet
NASA makes these images publicly
available by
it also provides us with rich metadata
about these images in JSON format we
took this JSON data as well as the
images and turn it into a beautiful app
with rich querying and voting
capabilities if you would like to learn
how we built this demo please go ahead
and download it along with step-by-step
instructions on our website thanks for
watching this video and i hope you'll
use dynamodb for your next application
